validatorInstanceType.description: AWS EC2 instance type for Validators (t2.micro, t2.large)

buildInstanceType.description: AWS EC2 instance type for Build Instance (t2.micro, t2.large)

rpcInstanceType.description: AWS EC2 instance type for RPC (t2.micro, t2.large)

joystreamAmi.description: Pre-built AMI ID - leave blank to build from source

volumeSize.description: Validator and Build instance volume size in GB

networkName.description: Network name used for chain-id, protocol-id, and display in telemetry

initialBalancesFile.description: HTTP Link to the Initial Balances file

runtimeProfile.description: STAGING | PLAYGROUND| TESTING - leave empty for production
